appDescription.message: Universal browser extension for Web 3 and the Polkadot ecosystem

pickColorDescription.message: This can be changed in the settings

speckleIntroduction.message: Speckle is a Web 3 wallet and browser built for Polkadot. You can interact with multiple chains and manage their accounts.

termDescription.message: Information Automatically Collected. We may automatically record certain information about how you use our Site (we refer to this information as “Log Data“). Log Data may include information such as a user’s Internet Protocol (IP) address, device and browser type, operating system, the pages or features of our Site to which a user browsed and the time spent on those pages or features, the frequency with which the Site is used by a user, search terms, the links on our Site that a user clicked on or used, and other statistics. We use this information to administer the Service and we analyze (and may engage third parties to analyze) this information to improve and enhance the Service by expanding its features and functionality and tailoring it to our users’ needs and preferences. We may use cookies or similar technologies to analyze trends, administer the website, track users’ movements around the website, and to gather demographic information about our user base as a whole. Users can control the use of cookies at the individual browser level. For more information, please see the section entitled “Cookies Policy” below.

passwordDescription.message: To make a secure entry to your wallet, create a new password

fileUpload.message: Drag n' drop the keystore file and click here to choose one

phraseDescription.message: Store your secret phrase in a safe location. It is required to restore you account.

copyTextMessage.message: Phrase copied to clipboard. Make sure to paste and save it to a secure place.

copyAddressMessage.message: Account address is copied to clipboard.

backupKeypairMessage.message: Great! Your first account has been created. Before you proceed, it is strongly recommended that you download the password protected key pair file and backup to a secure place.

mnemonicUnmatched.message: Mnemonic not matched with the generated one

howToImport.message: How would you like to import?

phraseOptionDesc.message: Restore an existing account by entering your 12 word seed phrase

keystoreOptionDesc.message: Restore an existing account by uploading your encrypted keystore file

keystoreOptionGuide.message: Upload keystore file and enter the password required to decrypt it

importKeystoreError.message: Cannot import the keystore file with the password supplied

errorMissingPage.message: It appears the page is missing at the moment. It may be still under development.
